title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint and cancelling the operation, the breakpoint is not cancelled and remains in the breakpoints pane.
OB: The exception breakpoint is not cancelled and remains in the breakpoints pane.
EB: When cancelling the operation to add an exception breakpoint, the breakpoint should be cancelled and removed from the breakpoints pane.
SR:
1) Open the debug perspective
2) Go to the breakpoints pane
3) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint
4) In the progress dialog, click cancel
